entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 10:51 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with drizzle near midnight and ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
